EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Today's voicemail (1563990408.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Angela,
I hope all is well with you today. I would like to schedule some time with you to obtain your toner and paper information as I am in the process of putting together a full solution for everyone. Could you let me know what day and time would be best to call you to obtain that information. Thanks so much for your time and I hope you're having a good summer so far.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
